content: सेकः [सिच्-घञ्] {@--1@} Sprinkling, watering (trees); सेकः सीकरिणा करेण विहितः कामं <ls>U. 3. 16</ls>, <ls>R. 1. 51</ls>, <ls n="R.">8. 45</ls>, <ls n="R.">16. 30</ls>, <ls n="R.">17. 16.</ls> {@--2@} Emission, effusion. {@--3@} Seminal effusion. {@--4@} A libation, an offering. {@--5@} Seminal fluid. {@--6@} A drop of anything.
